Name: LUNA
About the game: In this game you play as a little girl named 'Luna'. Survive from the dark being, while discovering the secrets behind her. The more you traverse on her memory, the more you will discover dark truths that lie deep inside. Synopsis This is the story of Luna. When she came home from school, what she found was a note from her parents that they will be back late. To Luna, who is left alone at home for midnight, a dark, cursed being slowly approaches. What purpose has this dark being got to come find this lone girl? Decide Luna's fate with your own hands.
Meta Title: LUNA: Nov 20, 2020, Simple and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on LUNA? Check out the release date (Nov 20, 2020), developer insights from Simple, and a complete game summary.
